testcase.name: Given Luma Home Page
When User Trigger Top Level Entry "Training"
And User Click Simple Product "Solo Power Circuit"
And User Add PDP Product "Solo Power Circuit" to Cart
Then Product "Solo Power Circuit" is added to Cart
And Luma Recovery Scenario
| Training | Solo Power Circuit |
Given Luma Home Page
When User Trigger Top Level Entry "What's New"
And User Add One of Listed Products "Go-Get'r Pushup Grips" to Cart
Then Product "Go-Get'r Pushup Grips" is added to Cart
And Luma Recovery Scenario
| What's New | Go-Get'r Pushup Grips |
Given Luma Home Page

testcase.name: Given Luma Home Page
When User Search Luma with String "bottle"
And User Click Simple Product "Affirm Water Bottle"
And User Add PDP Product "Affirm Water Bottle" to Cart
Then Product "Affirm Water Bottle" is added to Cart
And Luma Recovery Scenario
| bottle | Affirm Water Bottle |
Given Luma Home Page
When User Search Luma with String "jog"
And User Click Configurable Product "Geo Insulated Jogging Pant"
And User Select Random Swatch Options
And User Add PDP Product "Geo Insulated Jogging Pant" to Cart
Then Product "Geo Insulated Jogging Pant" is added to Cart

testcase.name: And Luma Recovery Scenario
